name: Some More About Nothing Quiz | Mixed 10 Questions | 10 Questions

questions.text: In the 1999 Spike Lee film 'Summer of Sam', what famous boxer makes a cameo appearance as a looter who steals a TV?
questions.explanation:
Holyfield.

	Remember he had his ear bit off by Tyson.

questions.text: What carry-on baggage were the Pilgrims permitted to bring aboard the Mayflower?
What is the actual color of Mars?
questions.explanation:
Yellowish brown.

	According to scientists who viewed thousands of images taken during the 1997 Pathfinder mission.

questions.text: In which sport do team members play at positions known as 'silly mid off,' 'deep square leg,' 'fly slip' and 'cover point'?
What role did the Rev. Martin Luther King Jr.'s daughter Yolanda Denise King play in the 1996 film 'Ghosts of Mississippi'?
questions.explanation:
Reena.

	She appeared as Medgar Ever's daughter.

questions.text: Where in the world did McDonald's open its first ski-through restaurant?
questions.explanation:
Sweden.

	On the slopes of Lindvallen in 1998.

questions.text: In professional basketball, what's the approximate length in inches of the white cord net that hangs from the rim?
questions.explanation:
17 and a half.

	Actually it is 17 and a half.

questions.text: What wood was used to make the Ark of the Covenant, according to the Bible?
questions.explanation:
Shittim.

	Exodus 25:10. Shittim is believed to be acacia.

questions.text: In which state does the federal government own the most land?
questions.explanation:
Nevada.

	In Nevada 84.5% percent of the land is owned by Uncle Sam and is followed up by Alaska with 69.1%.

questions.text: What trendy stuffed toy was banned at a number of U.S. military bases in 1999?
questions.explanation:
Furby.

	The fluffy bug eyed-toy was banned because its ability to record and replay speech made it a potential security risk.
